statements.query: match (n:RDSCluster) where n.deletion_protection = false SET n.compliance_failure = true , n.failed_rules = CASE WHEN 'rds-cluster-deletion-protection-enabled' in n.failed_rules THEN n.failed_rules ELSE coalesce(n.failed_rules+['rds-cluster-deletion-protection-enabled'], ['rds-cluster-deletion-protection-enabled']) END return n
